name: jubilantly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows or involves great happiness, especially because of a success: As she reached the finishing line, she jubilantly threw up her arms. People were jubilantly celebrating in the streets. See
jubilant
More examplesFewer examples "Joy to the World," he sang jubilantly.Researchers yesterday jubilantly announced a landmark gene therapy experiment.Tens of thousands of demonstrators jubilantly shouted in unison.
